ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Kind of a hodge-podge of various topics by different lecturers. Presentation and facilitation styles between faculty differs a lot. Some class sessions are great and others are a bit boring.

I would recommend it in the sense that you get as much out of it as you put the effort in for this class, and it provides the opportunity to self explore new areas you might not be familiar with. But then, I don't think it is a class where your are learning much from the actual instructors.
I would recommend the course to another student. It serves to broaden the students knowledge past what is learned in the introductory course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Increased my understanding of a number of key topics in immunology.

I wouldn't say the material covered in the class would directly contribute to my own dissertation research but I think it is important to be well-rounded and knowledgable in various areas and in that way it was helpful.
